name: ROBERT PATRICK
text: Wolf Plumbing performed a whole house replumb due to deteriorated copper lines. Shaun, Glen, and Billy worked non-stop a couple days to complete the project. Outstanding quality install and amazing how their experience and professionalism overcame many challenges. THANKS GUYS !!

resp.text: Thank you we really appreciate your business and kind words

name: Jennifer Allison
text: We are new home owners and have bought our dream home.   It had set for over a year before we bought it. It has come with some issues  and we choose Wolf Plumbing since we were new to the area.  We have used them twice and they have been Awesome and fixed both of our issues.   They explained in detail what was going on.   I  trust them to handle any of our future Plumbing issues...

name: Elysia Bailey
text: I have used wolf several times now. They are fast friendly and honest. He will tell you up front what is wrong and won't charge you for what doesn't need to be done! Great fast service I will use them every time!

name: sarahkat10
text: Great company. We bought gas logs as a Christmas for present for my parents. We measured the wrong dimensions and bought the wrong size. They exchanged them with no problem and answered many questions as I was unfamiliar with logs and the process. Very nice employees.

name: Jon Goggans
text: Gentleman took a lot of time with me explaining my rain bird sprinkler.  Hard to find good ole fashioned customer service like that any more.  Super knowledgeable and you can tell they honestly care about your business.  I will be back.  Very impressed with these folks

name: Robert Sherrill
text: Great service I got in and out in a short time

name: Rodney Cotten
text: They have the right part even when they do it yourself stores did not

name: Budmcintyre57
text: Excellent Service and support

name: Brian Shook
text: Employees here are very knowledgeable and if they can't help you they will point you in the right direction

name: Wayne Kilpatrick
text: Best plumbing supply house in the entire area... I've shopped with them for many years!

name: Randy Webb
text: Very helpful, highly recommend.

name: Cherokee Lair
text: Who knew plumbing fixtures could be so interesting? Expert advice & prompt service. Tallman's is truly a Shoals treasure.

name: FBF Family
text: Great customer service. Huge inventory. Great prices and well recommended products.

name: Blake Stephenson
text: Always great service and competitive pricing.  I highly recommend this plumbing supply company.

name: Timothy Whalen
text: Friendly and efficient. Helped us load our order. Handled a change no problem.

name: Gary Thompson
text: Had great service right off the bat unlike Lowe's loved it and a big think you to all the employees

name: Jeff Oliver
text: The very best plumbing supply store that my company has ever had service us.  The people there are professional, helpful and friendly.

name: Brian Beaver
text: This place is the best, they go above and beyond, the general public plumbing supply house, the people have great outlook on what you will need and do the best to get you going again.

name: Parker Hammond
text: Very friendly, fast, helpful service!

name: Donovan Prestage
text: Good knowledgeable folks here

name: David Higgs
text: Very helpfull people

name: Reagan Boyles
text: Great service and products

name: Emily Reischman
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: John Handy
text: Very nice people

name: Nirant Patel
text: Customer service is poor.

name: Sammy Jones
text: Very good

text:
